TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
You discover the horrifying truth and now you have the CIS, FBI and CIA hunting you.

I wish I would know all possible metals and alloys and their properties.

Granted, but you can't remember any of it.

I wish I don't miss the .25 hypetrain like I did last time.

Granted, you don't miss the .25 hypetrain but it misses you.

I wish I had better internet.

Granted, you can now only surf classy, good sites.

I wish for more bronies. (Muahahaha, you have to corrupt it...)

Granted. More people morph into bronies. Including all of your relatives & best friends!

I wish I could play KSP in my head.

Edited August 8, 2014 by Overfloater

AAAAHHHHHH! Make the Kraken stop! My brain hurts!

I wish I could edit my bank account to whatever amount I want.

Granted, but you are arrested for counterfeiting.

I wish I had something better to do.

Granted, but that something was watching a little girls TV show.

I wish I could land on Laythe.

But then you end up in soviet Russia and laythe lands on you.

I wish for more "in soviet Russia" jokes.

Because you're in Soviet Russia, wish grants me.

I wish for snow.

Granted, but it's brilliant.

The world evapourates. All of it. Even the houses.

I wish that Frozen simply didn't exist.

Granted. Not until people have let it go..... ahh I'm good at Frozen jokes.

I wish this wish was not a wish but a wish.

The wish granting genie got confused and gave you a rubber duck instead.

I wish my plants didn't die.

They didn't die. In fact, they mutated and combined into a horrible predatory carnivore with a taste for human flesh.

I wish I could sail around the world in a sail boat.

Granted.

"Oh no, looks like i'm lost. Oh well, sure rescue will come for- *food and water gets knocked off the boat* NOOOOOOOOOOO!!!"

I wish i knew the horrifying truth behind Apollo 18.

Granted, but now you can never sleep again.

I wish for a trip to the moon and back.

Granted. You go at lightspeed and never actually land, but you get crushed thrice by impossibly high gravities.

I wish for a LoTR movie.

Granted. It is directed by Michael Bay.

I wish for Michael Bay to make a great movie without any explosions.

Granted. It's titled My Little Pony: Dark Side of the Moon. The heart-warming tale of friends traversing the solar system and the inspired sountrack bring together Bronies and Pink Floyd fans.

I wish to travel the stars.

In Soviet Russia, stars travel you!

I wish for a brick.

Granted. It is sent towards your face at Mach 2.5

I wish I get banned.

Granted. You get banned.

.lamron keeps dluoc i hsiw I

Granted, you can speak normally... in Latin only!

I wish chairs were more comfortable.

Granted but they are so comfortable people are always on them and there are no moving versions so this creates a apocalyptic wasteland because everybody does not care about things likes like eating.

I wish for version 0.25 to come out with multiplayer.

Granted, 0.25 is released in ten years.

I wish for Harv not to sing anymore.
